Phone 7, said while sales were certainly a measure of the platform's success, customer satisfaction and developer investment were more important leading indicators. And to that end, the company has been pleased. 93 percent of Windows Phone customers are satisfied or very satisfied with Windows Phone 7, and 90 percent would recommend the phone to others, Greg Sullivan said.
